message.body: hey k! whats the name of that bug again? are you working 2morrow?
It's a tardigrade! Yup! See ya then!
heya Lady K! was wondering what days ur at the studio.
Heya! Probably Wednesday this week in the late afternoon/evening and maybe Friday/Saturday lemme know if those work for you!
friday works for me. I will be free all day friday
and next week my schedule is pretty open
Great! I'll give you a buzz on Friday!
I work in tha am 2day:( i will be available after work 2day if thats werks for you.
Oh yea, I won't be over there until 3ish anyway! Just give a ring before you head over!
just coming back from west philly. need 2 take care of money matter 4 my grandmom and sis.:( is it possible 2 raincheck 4 sunday or monday? gotta get t
hese buddies to you!
Lady! No worries at all...all good thoughts your way, and if you wanna get together tomorrow that'd be swell!
thanks K! i would love to meet 2morro. i am free all day Sunday for true.
Awesome. Wanna get some brunch in the nolibs area and then have puppet times? 11:30 or noon-esque?
yeah! you let me know where and i'll be there at 11:30. brunch! you are pure genius!
Sweet. Want boozy brunch or no? I'd say green eggs on 2nd or dos if you want a drink, but I'm down for wherevs!
Both are new 2 me. have been cravin a bloody mary. i vote boozy!
Brunch @ Dos sounds good!
i will c u there at noon.
Awright! Dos at noon, see ya there!
hooray
You are the most phenomenal!! Thank you so much!!
okay.looking 4ward to next week! have a fabu weekend!
thursday is perfekt! call u when i get outta work thursday. have a funky fantastic day:)
Still wanna come over today?
No worries on Thursday! Sunday will be grand, maybe around 5 ish? We're going to dos around 6 if you wanna join after!
Im gonna have 2 come by studio later..im Hung way over
Haha, me too. Just let me know when you are thinking bout heading over!
Hey, I've got a vehicle so I can swing by yr place in about an hour? What's yr address?
i just need 2 spray varnish the pieces. i 4got. hope its not 2 late 4 this Friday/ Sat. i will be workin the rest of this week
Hey lady, no worries! Hope yr feeling better. Just let me know when you wanna meet! I won't be at work again until the 20th, but if you wanna try this Saturday I'm down!
Heya! Gonna get a Carshare and come down...any idea when you'll be back?
Happy birthday lovely lady! And I keep forgetting to tell you how AWESOME yr puppet is. Whoa!!! Thank you SO MUCH!!! Have a rockin day!
Thanks 4 everything Kennedy! I'm glad 2 know you..glad u like the puppet! have a great weekend
heya! when are you workin this week?
Wed, fri, Saturday!

Hey you! Yes you! You helped me build things for water bears! Wow! In order to repay you, I'd like for you to help me one more time...by coming up with a tasty cocktail to serve at the show. Saturday august 20th, 5pm, the studio. I'll provide pizza, drink
heya K! tomorrow i will be at the Nubian Market. afterward i leave there I could shoot up 2 the stood
Cool! I'm done at 5, when are you done there?
Heya! I lost my phone over the wkend. Sorry 2 have missed the event:( I will hopefully see you soon and thanks for everything
Aw, We missed ya! Hope the south st adventure went well for you on saturday!
Sorry I didn't txt last night, was running amuck from work and rehearsal. Hope NYC is treatin you fine!
no worries! We r sorry to have missed you and upholstery:( we had a blast in NYC though. keep me in the know of upholstery shows....see you soon:)
Hey! Is yr south st thing today?
not this week...cause i went on vaca i decided to skip Nov. I might be there next 2nd Sattaday in Dec. I will definitly let you know
Ok, great!
